org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class ImageServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ImageServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ImageServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This class is used in Namesystem's jetty to retrieve/upload a file Typically used by the Secondary NameNode to retrieve image and edit file for periodic checkpointing in Non-HA deployments. Standby NameNode uses to upload checkpoints in HA deployments.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getParamsForPutImage

        static Map<String,String> getParamsForPutImage(Storage storage,
                                      long txid,
                                      long imageFileSize,
                                      NNStorage.NameNodeFile nnf)
        Set the required parameters for uploading image
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - instance of method to set the parameters
        storage - colon separated storageInfo string
        txid - txid of the image
        imageFileSize - size of the imagefile to be uploaded
        nnf - NameNodeFile Type
        Returns:
        Returns map of parameters to be used with PUT request.
